name: Dew Blush Liquid Cream Blush
about: What it is: A blendable and buildable dewy, liquid cream blush that melts into cheeks for a wash of color...Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Elderberry Fruit Extract: Fights free-radical and environmental damage..- Licorice Root Extract: Helps brighten the overall appearance of skin..- Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skinu2019s natural moisture level...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and vegan...What Else You Need to Know: Dew Blush is packed with skin-loving ingredients like Plant-Derived Glycerin and Licorice Root Extract for smooth, dewy and nourished skin. Say goodbye to harsh lines, our creamy formula blends seamlessly for a flush of natural color that's never patchy or streaky. The chunky doe-foot makes targeted application easy and allows you to build shades to your desired level. Dermatologist tested and safe for sensitive skin..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: - Elderberry Fruit Extract: Fights free-radical and environmental damage..- Licorice Root Extract: Helps brighten the overall appearance of skin..- Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skinu2019s natural moisture level....Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Glycerin, Tribehenin, Sambucus Nigra (Elderberry) Fruit Extract, Mica, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Silica, Morus Alba (White Mulberry) Root Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Root Extract. [+/- May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide Ci77891, Iron Oxides (Ci77492, Ci77491, Ci77499), Yellow 6 Lake, Red 7 Lake, Red 22 Lake, Ferric Ferrocyanide] .........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the chubby doe-foot to dab one to two dots of Dew Blush onto each cheek..-For deeper color, add more as desired..-Blend out with fingertips onto apples of cheeks, cheekbones, or anywhere else you want a flush of color..-Dew Blush blends seamlessly over Saie Slip Tint (sold separately) or Saie Glowy Super Gel (sold separately)....Recycling Instructions:.-Dew Blush's vial is made of 40% post-consumer recycled plastic..-While Dew Blush's components are made of recyclable materials, individual components under two inches do not typically make it through the curbside recycling stream. Saie works with Pact Collective to make sure your hard-to-recycle items get recycled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It blends very well and looks very natural on my skin. It lasts a long time and I would definitely repurchase this.

reviews.review_text: This blush goes well with my pale skin tone and it is very hydrating. Itu2019s super pigmented, therefore it lasts a long time. I totally recommend buying this.

reviews.review_text: Such a pretty color! Great pigment and blends really well. Packaging is 10x better than rare beauty. Rare beauty blushes are always so messy for me

reviews.review_text: It was ok it dident do much rare beauty blush is the same price and has more pigment it is a bit overpriced for the size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute. I love using this blush, I just wished I got a different shade but the formula is amazing & it gives the dewy look!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have mature skin. This formula is easy to blend & flattering colors! I have rosy, cutie & spicy. Simply a big fan of the Saie!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used blush before in my makeup routine and decided I'd give this a try. I sometimes can look naturally flushed so I was worried this would be too much, but it actually looks really nice. I just make sure to do a tiny dab and blend it in well - I think it has helped subtly accentuate my cheekbones and has added life to my face. I got Cutie which is maybe a bit too orangeish for my light skin tone - but since I use such a small amount, it still looks good.

reviews.review_title: This is Something I Can't Live Without
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is this absolutely the best blush (liquid, cream, powder) I have ever used. Saie is the best makeup I've ever used. It's clean for the environment,  it also works, and it looks amazing.  I noticed in some people's reviews that they seem to may be new to applying heavily pigmented liquid makeup. I have very light skin with pink untones. You always clean your face and moisturizer or use a moisturizing sunscreen. After I do that, I usually use  a light layer of the saie slip tint tinted moisturizing sunscreen. Then I put one big dot in the middle of my cheekbone (i do not let it dry!) I immediately begin to blend with the saie blush brush blending upward in small circle movements. I blend add more if needed blend more, etc. it should not stain if you put moisturizing or sunscreen under it, and it you did let it dry without blending it first.  Place the lid on evenly screw it on tight. Make sure it is screwed on eveningly and tight. You should wipe off all the excess around the rim of the bottle and all around the outside. If it is still leaking open it check again. Put in a plastic bag so it won't stain anything. I have never had this product stain my skin, stain any of my personal possessions or discolor, and leak.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In the blush I got the shade poppy. So pigmented, a little really goes a long way. But coming with it being pigmented it also stained my cheeks. Once I put it on my face and left it for a few seconds it aleady dryed under and stained   my face. Also the bottle started leaking, I stopped using it because I didnt like it so I dodnt open the bottle for awhile. And then this hot pink residue was all over the bottle and my make up holder. All that pink residue in the photo is from the blush and it wont come off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigmented, long lasting, easy to blend, and overall amazing product!

reviews.review_title: No-fuss, soft look and easy application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Much like the Glowy Super Gel, this blush glides on with ease. Great for someone new to makeup, or looking for a minimal, curated routine. Because it is such a forgiving product, I donu2019t have to stress about doing and re-doing my blush. The formula is sheer, yet packed with enough punch that it shortens the time I spend on blending, which I appreciate when I am in a pinch. Cutie and Rosy are next on my to-try list!

reviews.review_text: My favourite blush for a natural day! Or even for going out itu2019s absolutely beautiful.

I do find it applies and blends better with a blush brush than fingers, though.

reviews.review_text: I think I got the wrong shade for me in this product, but I do like the formulation of it. I got the shade poppy and itu2019s almost TOO pigmented. Poppy would maybe be a better shade for a darker skin tone. Whenever I apply it, it just looks like I put WAY too much blush on, even when using a light hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great product! very creamy and easy to blend. my only warning to buyers is the color u201cdreamyu201d is very pigmented so you can only use the smallest dot. for pale people like me this is definitely more of a bold blush but can be used well by using a small amount. overall good product, it lasts long too! i definitely recommend!

reviews.review_text: The Dew Blush Liquid Cream Blush in the shade Poppy is perfect for everyday makeup but also for going out. You donu2019t need to use much product each time because itu2019s so pigmented, but it blends out beautifully and naturally. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favourite blush of all time. The consistency is so  unique and it blends in so well. The colour lasts all day and it doesnu2019t get splotchy which tends to happen with some cream blushes. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Saie Dew Blush Liquid Cream Blush in the shade Chilly! The formula is so lightweight yet highly pigmented, making it super easy to blend for a natural flush or to build up for a bolder look. It leaves my skin with a dewy, radiant finish without feeling greasy. Plus, I love that itu2019s a clean, planet-aware product. The color Chilly is a gorgeous mauve shade that complements my skin tone perfectly and adds a fresh, youthful glow to my cheeks. A little goes a long way, so itu2019s definitely worth the price. This has become a staple in my makeup bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush has a gel-cream texture that is lightweight and blendable. When applied, it melts into the skin without feeling heavy or sticky. The dewy finish lives up to its name, giving a radiant, natural flush that looks like it comes from within. It doesnu2019t dry down completely, which may be ideal for those looking for a hydrated, luminous glow, but might not be the best for those with oily skin or looking for long-lasting wear without touch-ups.
